title: Songhai and the Moroccan Invasion - perspective

content.question: Which of the following best describes the perspective of the author of the excerpt?

choices.label: An intellectual writing about cultural developments that he misunderstands
A scholar recording the history of a region and culture that are familiar to him
An uneducated merchant recounting events in a foreign land
A ruler describing his successful conquest of a new region

content.answer: A scholar recording the history of a region and culture that are familiar to him

skill.text: 2.B: Describe a source's perspective, purpose, context, and audience.
